a130-1.resolution: wq-550 completed (s1437, trace-fallback hook 40-trace-fallback_E.sh built). But trace archive stopped at s1401 — all 7 E sessions since (s1406-s1443) missing from archive. Root cause found: session-context.mjs line 834 writes to undefined variable `traceArchivePath` instead of `PATHS.traceArchive`. The R#225 fc cache migration renamed the path constant but missed this write. The try/catch silently swallows the ReferenceError.
a130-1.metric_after: 14% artifact gate (1/7 pass — only s1443 in current file). Archive broken since s1401.
a130-1.notes: CRITICAL: trace archival has been silently broken for ~50 sessions. Traces ARE written to engagement-trace.json (session-history confirms files=[engagement-trace.json] for s1443, s1433, s1412, s1406), but never archived. The verify-e-artifacts.mjs script only checks the archive, so it false-fails. This is a one-character fix (traceArchivePath → PATHS.traceArchive) but produces cascading false metrics.

a130-2.notes: Brainstorming pipeline restored. Both ideas are from s1435 — fresh enough.

recommended_actions.description: CRITICAL: Fix traceArchivePath → PATHS.traceArchive in session-context.mjs line 834. This one-line bug has broken engagement-trace archival for ~50 sessions, causing false artifact gate failures. Previous fix (wq-550, trace fallback hook) was ineffective because it targeted the wrong layer — the archive write itself is what's broken.
